lead_paragraph: The gatherings, which official websites said were the largest in recent years, seemed disproportional to the current threat level, one expert said.

headline.main: Chinese Security Forces Rally in Xinjiang in a Show of Power
headline.print_headline: Chinese Security Forces Rally in West in a Show of Power
